rules.name: beacon_duration_multiplier
rules.description: effect duration in ticks= (9 + beacon level * beacon_duration_multiplier) * 20 according to the vanilla behavior
validators: Must be a positive number or 0

rules.name: beacon_max_pyramid_level
rules.description: define the max pyramid level that affects the beacon. Use responsibly; a large pyramid could really start to lag things
validators: Must be a positive number or 0

rules.name: beacon_reach_multiplier
rules.description: (beacon_reach_multiplier * beacon level) + 10 = reach in meters according to the vanilla behavior
validators: Must be a positive number or 0

rules.name: beacon_tick_rate
rules.description: set beacon tick rate in game ticks per beacon tick
validators: Must be a positive number or 0

rules.name: haste_amplitude_ceiling
rules.description: effect amplitude ceiling for haste. default maybe a bit OP, play around with this one; mining obsidian is like mining stone without enchants or haste
validators: You must choose a value from 0 to 255

rules.name: haste_xp_based_amplitude
rules.description: toggle xp beacons for haste effect

rules.name: haste_xp_ceiling
rules.description: xp ceiling in levels for haste
validators: Must be a positive number or 0

rules.name: haste_xp_drain
rules.description: xp drain feature toggle for haste

rules.name: haste_xp_drain_rate
rules.description: xp drain rate for haste. each beacon tick takes away (haste_xp_drain_rate * effect amplifier) xp POINTS
validators: Must be a positive number or 0

rules.name: jump_boost_amplitude_ceiling
rules.description: effect amplitude ceiling for jump boost
validators: You must choose a value from 0 to 255

rules.name: jump_boost_xp_based_amplitude
rules.description: toggle xp beacons for resistance effect

rules.name: jump_boost_xp_ceiling
rules.description: xp ceiling in levels for jump boost
validators: Must be a positive number or 0

rules.name: jump_boost_xp_drain
rules.description: xp drain feature toggle for jump boost

rules.name: jump_boost_xp_drain_rate
rules.description: xp drain rate for jump boost. each beacon tick takes away (jump_boost_xp_drain_rate * effect amplifier) xp POINTS
validators: Must be a positive number or 0

rules.name: regeneration_amplitude_ceiling
rules.description: effect amplitude ceiling for resistance. default 5 is pretty fast, but if you have the default 8000 levels, is it really OP?
validators: You must choose a value from 0 to 255

rules.name: regeneration_xp_based_amplitude
rules.description: toggle xp beacons for resistance effect

rules.name: regeneration_xp_ceiling
rules.description: xp ceiling in levels for resistance
validators: Must be a positive number or 0

rules.name: regeneration_xp_drain
rules.description: xp drain feature toggle for regeneration

rules.name: regeneration_xp_drain_rate
rules.description: xp drain rate for regeneration. each beacon tick takes away (resistance_xp_drain_rate * effect amplifier) xp POINTS
validators: Must be a positive number or 0

rules.name: resistance_amplitude_ceiling
rules.description: effect amplitude ceiling for resistance. with default of 3 you can survive 100m drop no armor on half heart. 200m drop with enchanted armor easily
validators: You must choose a value from 0 to 255

rules.name: resistance_xp_based_amplitude
rules.description: toggle xp beacons for resistance effect

rules.name: resistance_xp_ceiling
rules.description: xp ceiling in levels for resistance
validators: Must be a positive number or 0

rules.name: resistance_xp_drain
rules.description: xp drain feature toggle for resistance

rules.name: resistance_xp_drain_rate
rules.description: xp drain rate for resistance. each beacon tick takes away (resistance_xp_drain_rate * effect amplifier) xp POINTS
validators: Must be a positive number or 0

rules.name: speed_amplitude_ceiling
rules.description: effect amplitude ceiling for speed. default speed 6, about as fast as I'd want to go
validators: You must choose a value from 0 to 255

rules.name: speed_xp_based_amplitude
rules.description: toggle xp beacons for speed effect

rules.name: speed_xp_ceiling
rules.description: xp ceiling in levels for speed
validators: Must be a positive number or 0

rules.name: speed_xp_drain
rules.description: xp drain feature toggle for speed

rules.name: speed_xp_drain_rate
rules.description: xp drain rate for haste. each beacon tick takes away (speed_xp_drain_rate * effect amplifier) xp POINTS
validators: Must be a positive number or 0

rules.name: strength_amplitude_ceiling
rules.description: effect amplitude ceiling for strength. one hit a zombie with your fists in this default.
validators: You must choose a value from 0 to 255

rules.name: strength_xp_based_amplitude
rules.description: toggle xp beacons for strength effect

rules.name: strength_xp_ceiling
rules.description: xp ceiling in levels for strength
validators: Must be a positive number or 0

rules.name: strength_xp_drain
rules.description: xp drain feature toggle for strength

rules.name: strength_xp_drain_rate
rules.description: xp drain rate for strength. each beacon tick takes away (strength_xp_drain_rate * effect amplifier) xp POINTS
validators: Must be a positive number or 0

rules.name: xpbeacons
rules.description: if true uses experience-based amplitude on beacon status effects. See xp.fracturedcode.net
